description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3664671513 dated November 15, 2022 with a closing of January 31, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on Tuesday March 15, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Defense National Department, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of personal protective equipment against fuels and flammable products located in Bagotville, Québec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Ainerary
